title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.247 - Payroll
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.247 - Payroll

State Regulations
(a) A record
showing the wage or salary earned by employees for a certain period and the
various deductions for withholding tax, health benefits, and so on. (b) Total wages and salaries accrued or
payable for a given period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.247

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
